page.title: 0105340177: North East Peckham
page.content: The area is predominantly high-density council housing estates. There are no main shopping areas and very few recreational facilities. Interspersed throughout the block are commercial areas comprising of both modern distribution and older occasionally redundant warehouses. The overall impression is of neglect - there is a fair amount of wasteland and boarded- up buildings. The food shops reflect the ethnic mix of the population, including Jellied Eel Shops, Fish and Chip Shops, Halal meat Shops, Chinese and Indian Take-Aways. There is an active Civic Centre that puts on concerts and Art Exhibitions by local artists. The Museum is child- orientated and encourages school groups to visit. The gas-works dominates the landscape. The area has a high rate of unemployment.
